text: Berta Bonastre Peremateu (born 3 June 1992) is a Spanish field hockey forward who competed in the 2016 Summer Olympics. At the club level she plays in Belgium. In 2015, she received the Silver Stick award as the second best player in the Belgium's Athlon Hockey League. Her sister Silvia is also a field hockey player. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish female field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Spain Category:Field hockey players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Expatriate field hockey players Category:Spanish expatriates in Belgium Category:Female field hockey forwards
title: Berta Bonastre
